title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller or block printed on plain weave; glazed
description: Two pieces, same design, different colors. A) ground printed by "molette" in minute grey zig-zag, leaving white areas through which pass a design of long interlace in brown, forming trellis pattern. Clusters of little flowers in red (strawberry) blossoms and green foliage printed within trellis pattern, possibly by block or surface roller. B) same design, but interlace in blue. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller or block printed on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-10-b.
